title.narrative: SOCIAL PROTECTION AND POLICY DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Government and partners have enhanced capacity to design and implement child-sensitive social protection programmes, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: South Sudan increasingly implements child-sensitive policies and social protection programmes

participating-org.narrative: DIRECTORATE OF WATER AND SANITATION STATE MINISTRY OF COOPERATIVE AND RURAL DEVELOPMENT NORTHERN BAHR EL
STATE MINISTRY OF SOCIAL DEVELOPMEN CULTURE YOUTH AND SPORT

sector.narrative: Improved and integrated social proteciton data management (management information system, social and beneficiary registries, M&E systems)

Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
UNICEF-funded humanitarian cash transfers and/or vouchers (through mixed and parallel systems)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government and partners have enhanced capacity to design and implement child-sensitive social protection programmes

description.narrative: Although budget allocation for the social and humanitarian pillar (which includes social protection) fell from 2% (in FY2019/20) to 1% in FY2020/21, UNICEF achieved results in activities pertaining to coordination mechanisms and systems development. Notably, the SPPWG was regular and active, and the consultancy for the mapping of a Management Information System (MIS) for social protection was initiated and achieved significant results in 2021. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2022

Coordination: Coordination mechanisms for social protection systems established countrywide , Text

baseline.value: Level 1 -System is fragmented with no functioning formal social protection coordination mechanisms at central level or local levels

target.value: 2022:Level 3 -SP coordination mechanism is established and functioning at both central and local levels with clear mandates, responsibilities and operating modalities

actual.value: 2021:Leevel 3 - SP coordination mechanism established and functioning at both levels
